name: Joanne Dyer
body:
###About Me

Developer of Lumio, the innovative iOS puzzle game. Previously worked as a developer for Cassidian and General Electric.  

###Lumio

Lumio is a new puzzle game for iOS developed using Cocos2D.

![Lumio Icon](/images/Icon-72@2x.png)

#####Description

Act fast before the lights go out! 

Navigate across the lit-up platforms to collect stars and level up. But be quick, because when the lights go out you'll have to find a different route. Fight against the clock in this fast-paced puzzle game, take too long and it's game over!
				
Can't find a route? Collect power ups to bring a platform back to life…	err… light!

Compare high scores with your friends on GameCenter!

#####Support

Please send any issues or feedback to support@joannecdyer.com.
